Reviews.Title: Not happy
Reviews.Author: James Ward
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone for my wife because she needed a new phone. Once she received it and tried to activate it Verizon told her it was a prepaid phone and could not be used for our account. We had to return in and are waiting for our refund.Im ver upset because there is no statement in any of the information that even suggests the phone is a prepaid version.

ProductInfo.Features:
OS: Android 2.3, Gingerbread
Integrated Google Mobile Services, Microsoft Outlook Exchange (contacts and calendars), Social Networking Integration (contacts and calendars)
3.0MP camera with camcorder
Enjoy yourself anywhere, anytime, right from your Illusion. Browse through over 250,000 apps and games available through Google Play
What's in the box: Samsung Illusion, battery, microSD card, charger, safety and warranty card, and starter guide
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung Illusion Prepaid Phone, Platinum (Verizon Wireless)
